short.ar: Export IG followers, following to Excel CSV formats with IG Follower export
short.am: Export Instagram followers and following to Excel CSV formats with Export Instagram Followers tool
short.bg: Export IG followers and following to Excel CSV formats with IG Export followers
short.bn: Export Instagram followers and following to Excel CSV formats with Instagram Exporter
short.ca: Export Instagram followers and following to Excel CSV formats with Instagram Export followers
short.cs: Scrape Instagram followers, following to Excel CSV formats with Instagram followers scraper
short.da: Scrape Instagram followers, following to Excel CSV formats with Instagram Scraper
short.de,el,en,en_AU,en_US,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,: Export IG followers, following to Excel CSV formats
short.en_GB: Export IG followers, following to Excel CSV formats with IG Exporter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
IG Exporter is a tool that export followers from Instagram profiles to Excel or CSV.

Features:
* Export followers or following
* Export up to 50k followers
* CSV and Excel formats with proper column format
* Handles IG rate limit errors (read below)

Supported columns:
- ID (numeric Instagram ID)
- User name
- Full name
- Profile picture URL
- Is IG profile verified 

How to use:
1. Open the extension’s popup by clicking the puzzle button in the right section of the toolbar.
2. Find the IG Exporter icon there and click it
3. Select the “Export Instagram data” option
4. The export tool is opened
5. Specify IG username or URL
6. Click the “Start” button and follow the instructions within the app

Rate limit:
Instagram enforces rate limit i.e. limit on the number of requests. The rate limit is not public information and varies depending on your IP address.
How it works in IG Exporter:
If you export a huge list of followers, you can experience a rate limit error
The app goes into “Cooldown” mode. The timer shows the time remaining.
If the error persists, the cooldown period increases 2x.
Once the cooldown period end and the subsequent request is successful, the app switches to the Normal mode. 

Please note, IG Exporter is a freemium software. You can export up to 550 followers for free. You should upgrade to export more.
To upgrade, you should create an account or log in with your Google account.
Please try the app before purchase we don’t offer refunds.
long.en,en_AU:
Exporter for Followers (previously known as "Exporter for IG" and "IG Exporter") is a tool that export followers from Instagram profiles to Excel or CSV.

Features:
* Export followers or following
* Export up to 50k followers
* CSV and Excel formats with proper column format
* Handles IG rate limit errors (read below)

Supported columns:
- ID (numeric Instagram ID)
- User name
- Full name
- Profile picture URL
- Is IG profile verified 

How to use:
1. Open the extension’s popup by clicking the puzzle button in the right section of the toolbar.
2. Find the Exporter for IG icon there and click it
3. Select the “Export Instagram data” option
4. The export tool is opened
5. Specify IG username or URL
6. Click the “Start” button and follow the instructions within the app

Rate limit:
Instagram enforces rate limit i.e. limit on the number of requests. The rate limit is not public information and varies depending on your IP address.
How it works in Exporter for IG:
If you export a huge list of followers, you can experience a rate limit error
The app goes into “Cooldown” mode. The timer shows the time remaining.
If the error persists, the cooldown period increases 2x.
Once the cooldown period end and the subsequent request is successful, the app switches to the Normal mode. 

Please note, Exporter for IG is a freemium software. You can export up to 550 followers for free. You should upgrade to export more.
To upgrade, you should create an account or log in with your Google account.
long.en_GB,en_US:
Exporter for Followers is a tool that export followers from Instagram profiles to Excel or CSV.

Upd Aug-2023: Renamed from Exporter for IG to Exporter for Followers. Because Facebook thinks that "confuse consumers into believing that the extension is official". For more info ask them by email lparnell@kilpatricktownsend.com 

Upd Jun-2022: Fixed broken functionality due to IG API changes
